title: ScanAware — Ingredient & Safety Scanner
short_description: Scan barcodes to see ingredient breakdowns, toxicity signals, and origin info — privacy-first.
full_description: ScanAware helps you understand the products you buy. Scan barcodes or enter them manually to see ingredient breakdowns, quick toxicity heuristics, sustainability scores, and origin/manufacturer hints. We prioritize privacy: no personal data is collected and all local data is stored on-device and encrypted.
promo_text: Know what's inside — scan, learn, and shop safer.
what_s_new: v1.0.1: Play Store launch — improved toxicity heuristics, sustainability scoring, and privacy-first defaults.
